    Title

    Another Title

    More text here.

    Layout: Sidebar Custom

    This post has a custom sidebar set in the post’s YAML Front Matter.

    An example of how that YAML could look is:

    sidebar:
  - title: "Title"
    image: "/assets/images/your-image.jpg"
    image_alt: "image"
    text: "Some text here."
  - title: "Another Title"
    text: "More text here."
    nav: sidebar-sample

    Updated: June 23, 2021

    Layout: Post Date Enabled

    December 13, 2021

    This post has post date enabled. The date the post was published should show if show_date: true is added to it’s YAML Front Matter or as a default in _config...
